title: One Bert Show Member Opens Up About Their Estranged Relationship With Their Father
description:
Lately, our producer Keith has had mixed emotions about her father. She was excited when they first re-connected, but now her feelings towards him have started to change. She's not sure why she feels this way or what she can do to change it. 
Before we get into that, have you heard these strange laughs from people?
